description.value:
When your deity blesses your warlike acts, you can extend that favor to your allies.

You can grant the temporary Hit Points from @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Replenishment of War]{Replenishment of War} to an ally within 10 feet instead of gaining them yourself. You can grant these temporary Hit Points to a different ally each time, meaning you might be able to grant them to multiple creatures in a single turn.
